response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and contribute greatly to your success. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I understand its worth to you is $1,500,000. As the exclusive seller, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,400,000, a special discount tailored to recognize your keen interest and commitment to excellence. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a game-changing asset at a highly competitive rate. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1400000}
